snippet: A public service advertisement depicting pandas as ill-behaved louts on holiday in Australia — tossing litter, painting graffiti and barging over pedestrians with arms full of shopping bags — did not go over well in China.
abstract: A public service advertisement depicting pandas as ill-behaved louts on holiday in Australia — tossing litter, painting graffiti and barging over pedestrians with arms full of shopping bags — did not go over well in China.

headline.main: Ad Featuring Pandas Behaving Badly Quickly Goes Extinct
